preterite.spanish: Pensé mucho antes de tomar esa decisión importante.
preterite.english: I thought a lot before making that important decision.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Pensaste que era una broma pero era en serio.
preterite.english: You thought it was a joke but it was serious.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Pensaste que no ibas a poder pero lo lograste.
preterite.english: You thought you wouldn't be able to but you did it.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Pensó en su familia durante todo el viaje.
preterite.english: He/She thought about his/her family during the entire trip.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Pensamos que llegaríamos tarde pero llegamos a tiempo.
preterite.english: We thought we would be late but we arrived on time.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Pensasteis que el examen sería fácil.
preterite.english: You all thought the exam would be easy.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Pensaron que era imposible hasta que lo vieron.
preterite.english: They thought it was impossible until they saw it.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Pensaré en una solución durante el fin de semana.
future.english: I will think of a solution during the weekend.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Pensarás diferente cuando tengas más experiencia.
future.english: You will think differently when you have more experience.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Pensarás en mí cuando estés lejos.
future.english: You will think of me when you're far away.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Pensará en jubilarse después de los sesenta.
future.english: He/She will think about retiring after sixty.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Pensaremos en mudarnos a una ciudad más pequeña.
future.english: We will think about moving to a smaller city.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Pensaréis en las consecuencias antes de actuar.
future.english: You all will think about the consequences before acting.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Pensarán que estamos locos por este proyecto.
future.english: They will think we're crazy for this project.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Entendí el problema después de leer el manual.
preterite.english: I understood the problem after reading the manual.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Entendiste la lección mejor que todos.
preterite.english: You understood the lesson better than everyone.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Entendiste perfectamente lo que quería decir.
preterite.english: You understood perfectly what I meant.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Entendió las instrucciones sin necesidad de repetirlas.
preterite.english: He/She understood the instructions without needing to repeat them.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Entendimos el mensaje oculto en la película.
preterite.english: We understood the hidden message in the movie.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Entendisteis la importancia del proyecto.
preterite.english: You all understood the importance of the project.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Entendieron que era hora de cambiar de estrategia.
preterite.english: They understood it was time to change strategy.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Entenderé mejor el idioma después de vivir allí.
future.english: I will understand the language better after living there.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Entenderás la situación cuando seas padre.
future.english: You will understand the situation when you become a father.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Entenderás por qué tomé esa decisión.
future.english: You will understand why I made that decision.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Entenderá la complejidad del problema mañana.
future.english: He/She will understand the complexity of the problem tomorrow.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Entenderemos mejor después de la explicación.
future.english: We will understand better after the explanation.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Entenderéis la cultura después de vivir aquí.
future.english: You all will understand the culture after living here.

future.spanish: Entenderán las reglas después del entrenamiento.
future.english: They will understand the rules after training.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Sentí una gran emoción al ver a mi familia.
preterite.english: I felt great emotion when I saw my family.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Sentiste el terremoto desde el quinto piso.
preterite.english: You felt the earthquake from the fifth floor.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Sentiste mucha nostalgia al volver al barrio.
preterite.english: You felt a lot of nostalgia when returning to the neighborhood.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Sintió alivio cuando terminó el examen final.
preterite.english: He/She felt relief when the final exam ended.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Sentimos orgullo por el logro de nuestro hijo.
preterite.english: We felt pride for our son's achievement.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Sentisteis la brisa del mar en la playa.
preterite.english: You all felt the sea breeze on the beach.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Sintieron miedo durante la tormenta eléctrica.
preterite.english: They felt fear during the thunderstorm.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Sentiré mucha alegría cuando me gradúe.
future.english: I will feel great joy when I graduate.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Sentirás la diferencia después del tratamiento.
future.english: You will feel the difference after treatment.

future.spanish: Sentirás paz cuando resuelvas el conflicto.

future.spanish: Sentirá nostalgia por su país natal.

future.spanish: Sentiremos el calor del verano muy pronto.
future.english: We will feel the summer heat very soon.

future.spanish: Sentiréis satisfacción al completar el proyecto.
future.english: You all will feel satisfaction when completing the project.

future.spanish: Sentirán el impacto del cambio inmediatamente.
future.english: They will feel the impact of the change immediately.

preterite.spanish: Vine directamente del aeropuerto a verte.
preterite.english: I came directly from the airport to see you.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Viniste corriendo cuando escuchaste la noticia.
preterite.english: You came running when you heard the news.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Viniste desde muy lejos para estar aquí.
preterite.english: You came from very far away to be here.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Vino a la fiesta aunque estaba enfermo.
preterite.english: He/She came to the party even though he/she was sick.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Vinimos en el primer vuelo de la mañana.
preterite.english: We came on the first flight of the morning.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Vinisteis sin avisar pero fue una sorpresa agradable.
preterite.english: You all came without warning but it was a pleasant surprise.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Vinieron de diferentes países para el congreso.
preterite.english: They came from different countries for the conference.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Vendré a visitarte en cuanto tenga tiempo libre.
future.english: I will come visit you as soon as I have free time.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Vendrás conmigo al concierto el sábado.
future.english: You will come with me to the concert on Saturday.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Vendrás a Buenos Aires para las fiestas.
future.english: You will come to Buenos Aires for the holidays.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Vendrá a trabajar con nosotros el próximo mes.
future.english: He/She will come work with us next month.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Vendremos a cenar a tu casa el domingo.
future.english: We will come have dinner at your house on Sunday.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Vendréis a la boda aunque sea lejos.
future.english: You all will come to the wedding even if it's far.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Vendrán turistas de todo el mundo este verano.
future.english: Tourists will come from all over the world this summer.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Puse las llaves en el cajón de la cocina.
preterite.english: I put the keys in the kitchen drawer.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Pusiste mucho esfuerzo en el proyecto final.
preterite.english: You put a lot of effort into the final project.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Pusiste la mesa muy elegante para la cena.
preterite.english: You set the table very elegantly for dinner.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Puso toda su atención en el discurso.
preterite.english: He/She put all his/her attention on the speech.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Pusimos flores frescas en todos los jarrones.
preterite.english: We put fresh flowers in all the vases.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Pusisteis las maletas en el maletero del coche.
preterite.english: You all put the suitcases in the car trunk.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Pusieron música suave durante la cena romántica.
preterite.english: They put on soft music during the romantic dinner.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.english: You will put the photos in the family album.

preterite.spanish: Salí de casa muy temprano para evitar el tráfico.
preterite.english: I left home very early to avoid traffic.

preterite.spanish: Saliste corriendo cuando viste la araña.
preterite.english: You ran out when you saw the spider.

preterite.spanish: Saliste a bailar hasta muy tarde anoche.
preterite.english: You went out dancing until very late last night.

preterite.spanish: Salió del hospital completamente recuperado.
preterite.english: He/She left the hospital completely recovered.

preterite.english: We left on vacation to the beach on Friday.

preterite.spanish: Salisteis del cine antes de que terminara la película.

preterite.spanish: Me duché rápidamente antes de salir al trabajo.
preterite.english: I showered quickly before leaving for work.
